item.description:
Due to last week's heavy snow fall this meetup has been rescheduled for the 25th.
If it snows heavily again today then please join us next month on the 3rd Sunday in Feb!
item.how_to_find_us: Come to rear of building next to parking spaces & enter red door on first floor

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be! New Years Blessings
